augmentation.description: Each variation has unique randomized augmentation seeded by (variation_idx * 1000 + letter_idx)
augmentation.train_val_separation: Training uses variation indices 0-N, Validation uses indices 10000-10000+N (completely different random seeds)
augmentation.total_style_combinations: num_fonts * 2 sizes * 2 colors = unique base styles per variation index
augmentation.randomization_note: Rotation and jitter are randomly sampled per variation using deterministic seed, ensuring train/val never overlap

stop_reason: PLATEAU: No improvement for 300 epochs (best: 5.77% @ epoch 58)
